Actions.Name: Bravado
Actions.Description: This character sacrifices 50% of their max hp but immediately gains +1 action.

Name: Camaraderie
Description: +1 boon on attacks and saves for every adjacent ally.

Name: Great Faith
Description: [name]s can take slow turns like players. If they choose to take a slow turn, they gain 3 vigor.

Name: Stack Dice
Description: Once a combat, when the Churner would roll a random d6 as part of an ability, they can choose which number to roll.

Actions.Name: Stack Dice Move
Actions.Description: Roll 1d6 and dash up to that many spaces.

Actions.Name: Strive
Actions.Description: Until the start of their next turn, the [name] increases the distance of any dash, rush, teleport or flight by +3.
